summary: Memory leaks issue in google map page

comments.content:
I have written google map page using Google API v3.x is producing enormous memory leaks.

I'm testing on Firefox 13.0.1.

Loading google map page initial stage. after every 30 seconds to update the place marker in google map.

One stage the page is not responding.

It take more memory.

How to clear the google map memory?
How is this related to osmdroid?
